content: Solving a tactical exercise, understanding a difficult ending, following a live match and trying to "guess" the moves that will be played. All of this is fun.
translations: ita:Risolvere un esercizio tattico, capire un finale difficile, seguire una partita dal vivo e cercare di indovinare le moss
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
